scripts.test:minify: set -e; yarn run minify; mocha test/minify*
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; yarn run test:minify; yarn npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing --access public
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn install; yarn run:test:minify; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags;
